name: Tao Meng
story: Born in a small village in Southern China, Wen Tong joined the People's Liberation Army at a young age. He quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional leadership skills and attention to detail. Now, as a squad leader in the OPFOR, Wen Tong is responsible for leading his team in some of the most challenging and dangerous missions. He is respected by his team for his calm and decisive demeanor, but some suspect that he has a hidden ruthless side that only comes out in extreme situations.
